textBeforeTable: Jack. Your amigo, Down boy! But remember - if you continue being a filthy animal, people will keep whipping you into submission. Poor Tom, flogging your brute ass hurts me more than you, really. Just so you know, I've been a follower of this site almost from day one (anyone remember the Hotspot with its blue-and-yellow background?). You'd know that, but you're new. It's a classy and well-informed site, and all of a sudden I'm tearing it apart because I talked smack about some second-rate frontman. You do have a flair for drama, I'll give you that... Oh, but I forgot! At least Pearcy writes! (that's how you put it, yes?). That's the excuse for all sub-standard musicians...they'll write a rotten (or even worse, mediocre - mediocrity is always worse than flat-out sucking) song and their piss-poor argument for doing so is "Hey! At least I write, goddammit!". Well, keep at it, cause you need plenty of practice! The action of writing does not justify writing poorly. It's just that pointing this kind of stuff out gets you all self-righteous and prissy, doesn't it? Got it? Just like in grade school! Fuck grade school, Socrates would be proud! c) Jack does not visit the Ratt site. b) All people who visit the
